stream.scotty.core

Class TimeMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • stream.scotty.core.TimeMeasure

  • public final class TimeMeasure
extends java.lang.Object
    The definition of a time interval for windowing.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long size
      The size of the windows generated by this policy.
      private java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit
      The time unit for this policy's time interval.
